content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu. It's great to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a perfect fit for your needs. Let's discuss the rental price. What is your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student so I have a limited budget. I was thinking of around 300 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 300 euros per month is not enough for an apartment of this quality in the city center. The market rate for a similar apartment is much higher. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the market rate is higher. However, I am a smart and dependable student who always pays his bills on time. I can also take very good care of your apartment. How about 350 euros per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While your reliability as a tenant is certainly commendable, the price of 350 euros per month still falls short of the market value for this apartment. I'm sure you understand that I need to cover my costs and make a reasonable profit. Would you be willing to negotiate further?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. I am willing to pay 400 euros per month. I am a responsible and trustworthy tenant. I will take great care of your apartment and always pay my rent on time. I hope this meets your requirements.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your offer of 400 euros per month is more in line with the market value, but I'm still not convinced it's the best deal for me. I'm sure you're a great tenant, but I need to ensure I'm getting the maximum return on my investment. Would you be willing to go a bit higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable. I am willing to pay 425 euros per month. I am a responsible and trustworthy tenant. I will take great care of your apartment and always pay my rent on time. I hope this meets your requirements.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your offer of 425 euros per month is getting closer to what I'm looking for. However, I'd like to see if we can push the price a little higher. Would you be willing to go up to 450 euros per month? This would be a fair reflection of the apartment's value and your commitment as a tenant.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. I am willing to pay 440 euros per month. I am a responsible and trustworthy tenant. I will take great care of your apartment and always pay my rent on time. I hope this meets your requirements.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your offer of 440 euros per month is very close to what I'm seeking. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Would you be willing to round it up to 450 euros per month to make it a clean number? This would be a fair agreement for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 450 euros per month!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 450 euros per month! Great! We have a deal. I'm sure you'll enjoy living in my apartment. Please let me know if you have any questions or need assistance with anything. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
